Commands.Freeze Joker: 1-HIT AoE magic BRV attack  Inflicts 「Freeze」 to all enemies for 2 turns  「Freeze」 prevents BRV gain
Commands.Red Card: 9-HIT ranged BRV attack  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 2 turns
Commands.Boost Up All: Slightly raises all party members' Max BRV for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Prismatic Flash: 7-HIT AoE magic BRV attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  Raises all party members' BRV except for the character with the highest current BRV  Deals an AoE HP attack  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies  Extends the duration of existing self buffs by 1 turn  Grants 「Black Jack」 for 6 turns   「Black Jack」 has the following effects:  - Slightly raises party Attack and Max BRV  - Slightly raises self Attack and Max BRV

Passives.Freeze Joker Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Freeze Joker
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy
Passives.Freeze Joker BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Freeze Joker
Passives.Red Card Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Red Card
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Red Card Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Red Card
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%
Passives.All In: Moderately raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed after using  Freeze Joker  twice
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack while buffed
Passives.Freeze Joker Extend: Freeze Joker use +1When using  Freeze Joker :- Moderately raises its potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV- Triggers an HP attack after use
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Red Card Extend: Red Card  use +1When using  Red Card :- Tremendously raises its total potency- Triggers an HP attack after every 3 BRV hits- Extends the duration of  Max BRV Up  by 4 turns- Grants  Small Attack Up  for 6 turns- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+  for 6 turns-  BRV Attack+  is a 3-HIT ranged BRV attack that triggers an HP attack if BRV is over 80% Max BRV
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party's Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Boost Up All Extend: When using  Boost Up All :- Slightly improves  Max BRV Up  effect

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Boost Up All  use +1Duration of  Boost Up All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Deathstrike Darts CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Prismatic Flash
Weapons.Death Tarot CP: 15: Grants  Small Max BRV Up  to all party members for 3 turns
Weapons.Darts CP: 35: Increases the potency of  Red Card  and delays the target by 1 turn
